Click \"Update\" button or refresh the p: Danna maɓallin “Sabunta” ko sabunta shafin kowane lokaci don samun sabbin sabuntawa.
Contains aligned sequences in {{formatNa: Ya ƙunshi jerin daidaitawa a cikin tsarin {{formatName}}.
Contains all of the above files in a sin: Ya ƙunshi duk fayilolin da ke sama a cikin fayil ɗin {{formatName}} guda ɗaya.
Contains detailed results of the analysi: Ya ƙunshi cikakken sakamakon bincike, kamar su clades, canje-canje, ma'aunin QC da sauransu, a cikin tsarin {{formatName}} (newline-delimited JSON). Ya dace don ƙarin sarrafawa ta atomatik. Lura cewa wannan tsarin ba shi da tabbas kuma zai iya canzawa ba tare da sanarwa ba.

Ya ƙunshi cikakken sakamakon bincike, kamar clades, canje-canje, ma'aunin QC da sauransu, a cikin tsarin {{formatName}}. Ya dace don ƙarin sarrafawa ta atomatik. Lura cewa wannan tsarin ba shi da tabbas kuma zai iya canzawa ba tare da sanarwa ba.
Contains results of translation of your: Ya ƙunshi sakamakon fassarar jerin ku. Fayil na {{formatName}} ɗaya a kowane kwayar halitta, duk a cikin tarihin zip.
Contains summarized results of the analy: Ya ƙunshi taƙaitaccen sakamakon bincike, kamar su clades, canje-canje, ma'aunin QC da sauransu, a cikin tsarin jadawalin. Ya dace don ƙarin bita da sarrafawa ta amfani da maƙunsar bayanai ko kayan aikin kimiyyar bayanai.
Currently selected dataset does not seem: A halin yanzu da aka zaɓa da alama ya dace da jerin ku ba kuma algorithm na shawara bai kasa samun wani madadin ba. Zaɓi saitin bayanai da hannu. Idan babu wani bayanan da ya dace, yi la'akari da ƙirƙirar da ba da gudummawa ɗaya ga tarin bayanan ƙungiyar Nextclade.
A halin yanzu da aka zaɓa da alama ba su dace da jerin ku ba, amma akwai {{ n }} sauran saitin bayanai waɗanda zasu iya. Danna “Canza bayanan bayanan tunani” don ganin jerin.
A halin yanzu da aka zaɓa da alama bai dace da jerin ku ba, amma akwai bayanan bayanai 1 wanda zai iya. Danna “Canza bayanan bayanan tunani” don ganin jerin.
Dataset authors marked this dataset as d: Marubutan bayanai sun yi alama da wannan bayanan a matsayin wanda aka ƙare, wanda ke nufin saitin bayanan ya wuce, ba za a sake sabunta su ba ko kuma bai dace ba in ba haka ba. Da fatan za a tuntube marubutan bayanai don takamaiman bayanai
Dataset authors marked this dataset as e: Marubutan bayanai sun yi alamar wannan bayanan a matsayin gwaji, wanda ke nufin saitin bayanai har yanzu yana ƙarƙashin ci gaba, yana da ƙananan inganci fiye da yadda aka saba ko yana da wasu batutuwa. Yi amfani da haɗarin kansa. Da fatan za a tuntube marubutan bayanai don takamaiman bayanai
Ba a gane tsarin fayil ɗin bayanai ba.
Dataset files currently customized: {{n}: Fayilolin bayanan da aka keɓance a halin yanzu: {{n}}
Datasets vary by the pathogen, strain an: Bayanan bayanai sun bambanta ta hanyar kwayoyin cuta, damuwa da sauran halaye. Kowane bayanan yana dogara ne akan jerin tunani na musamman. Wasu bayanai kawai suna da isassun bayanai don bincike na asali, wasu - ƙarin bayani don ba da damar ƙarin zurfin bincike da dubawa. Mawallafin bayanai lokaci-lokaci suna sabunta kuma inganta bayanan su.
Dismiss this notification. You can updat: Yi watsi da wannan sanarwar. Kuna iya sabunta Nextclade kowane lokaci daga baya ta hanyar sabunta shafin.
Download aligned peptides in {{formatNam: Zazzage peptides masu daidaituwa a cikin tsarin {{formatName}}, fayil ɗaya a kowane kwayar halitta, duk a cikin tarihin zip.
Download aligned sequences in {{formatNa: Zazzage jerin daidaitawa a cikin tsarin {{formatName}}.
Download phylogenetic tree with sequence: Zazzage itacen phylogenic tare da jerin da aka sanya a kanta, a cikin tsarin {{formatName}}.
Download results of the analysis in {{fo: Zazzage sakamakon bincike a cikin tsarin {{formatName}}.
Download summarized results in {{formatN: Zazzage sakamakon taƙaitaccen a cikin tsarin {{formatName}}.
Drag & drop files or folders: Ja & sauke fayiloli ko manyan fayiloli
Enable suggestion of best matching patho: Kunna shawarar mafi kyawun bayanai masu dacewa da cututtuka. Da fatan za a ƙara bayanan jerin don ƙaddamar da injin shawara.
Enter URL to a file to fetch: Shigar da URL zuwa fayil ɗin don ɗaukar
Enter genome annotation in {{formatName}: Shigar da bayanin kwayar halitta a cikin tsarin {{formatName}}
Enter pathogen description in {{formatNa: Shigar da bayanin cututtuka a cikin tsarin {{formatName}}
Enter reference sequence in {{formatName: Shigar da jerin tunani a cikin tsarin {{formatName}}
Enter reference tree in {{formatName}} f: Shigar da itacen tunani a cikin tsarin {{formatName}}
Enter sequence data in FASTA format: Shigar da bayanan jerin a cikin tsarin FASTA

Filter: opens panel where you can apply: Tace: yana buɗe kwamitin inda zaku iya amfani da tace layin tebur
Forbidden. You don't have necessary perm: Haramta. Ba ku da izinin da ake buƙata don samun damar wannan albarkatun. (Lambar matsayin HTTP: {{status}})
Go to main page to add input files: Je zuwa babban shafi don ƙara fayilolin shigarwa
Go to main page to add more input files: Je zuwa babban shafi don ƙara ƙarin fayilolin shigarwa
Here you can override individual files i: Anan zaku iya soke fayilolin mutum a cikin bayanan. Idan ba a bayar da fayil ba, za a maye gurbin shi daga tsarin bayanan da aka zaɓa a halin yanzu. Ƙarin koyo a cikin {{documentation}}
Here you can select columns (individual: Anan zaku iya zaɓar ginshiƙai (mutum ko nau'ikan) waɗanda za a rubuta su cikin fayilolin CSV da TSV.
However, this is not recommended: this v: Koyaya, ba a ba da shawarar wannan: wannan sigar aikace-aikacen ba a sake sabunta ko tallafawa ba, kuma ba za mu iya ba da tabbacin cewa zai yi aiki ba, kuma zai samar da sakamako mai kyau.
I want to try anyway: Ina so in gwada duk da haka
If you did not mean to request a custom: Idan ba ku nufin neman bayanan al'ada ba, to cire sigogin 'dataset-url' daga URL ko sake kunna aikace-aikacen.
If you don't find a dataset for a pathog: Idan baku sami bayanan bayanai don ƙwayoyin cuta ko damuwa da kuke buƙata ba, to zaku iya ƙirƙirar bayananku. Hakanan zaka iya buga shi zuwa tarin al'ummarmu, don wasu mutane su iya amfani da shi ma.
If you use results obtained with Nextcla: Idan kuna amfani da sakamakon da aka samu tare da Nextclade a cikin littafi, da fatan za a ƙara bayani zuwa takardarmu:

In the meantime, you can try to run agai: A halin yanzu, zaku iya ƙoƙarin sake gudu ta amfani da tsohuwar sigar Nextclade: {{ lnk }}
It is likely that this dataset is out of: Wataƙila wannan bayanan ya ƙare kuma kawai ya dace da nau'ikan {{project}} na farko. Da fatan za a kai ga marubutan bayanai don su iya canza bayanan zuwa sabon tsari. An bayyana hanyar a cikin takaddun aikin.
Known premature stop codons ({{ n }}): Sanannen codons na tsayawa da wuri ({{ n }})

Link to our GitHub page: Haɗa zuwa shafin mu na GitHub
Markers are the colored rectangles which: Alamomi sune launuka masu launi waɗanda ke wakiltar sauye-sauye, gogewa da dai sauransu Akwai iyakar fasaha na adadin waɗannan za a iya nuna a lokaci guda, dangane da yadda kwamfutarka ke da sauri. Kuna iya daidaita ƙofar a cikin tattaunawar 'Saituna', samun dama tare da maɓallin akan saman panel.
Method not allowed: Hanyar da ba a yarda ba
Missing data found: An gano bayanan da suka ɓace
Mixed sites found: An samo shafukan da aka haɗa
Motifs carried from reference sequence (: Abubuwan da aka ɗauka daga jerin tunani (wani lokacin canza)
Motifs which are not present in referenc: Abubuwan da ba su kasance a cikin jerin tunani, amma sun bayyana a cikin jerin tambaya
Motifs which are present in reference se: Abubuwan da suke cikin jerin tunani, amma suna ƙunshe da rashin daidaituwa a cikin jerin tambaya
Abubuwan da suke cikin jerin tunani, amma sun ɓace a cikin jerin tambaya
Saitin bayanai masu dacewa da yawa.
Mutations relative to nearest node (priv: Sauye-sauye dangane da node mafi kusa (canji masu zaman kansu)
Nextclade software is built to be agnost: An gina software na Nextclade don zama mai ban sha'awa ga ƙwayoyin cuta da yake nazari. Ana ba da bayanin game da ƙwayoyin cuta na kankare a cikin nau'in da ake kira Nextclade bayanai.
No datasets match your data. Select a da: Babu saitin bayanai da suka dace da bayanan ku. Zaɓi bayanan da hannu. Idan babu wani bayanan da ya dace, yi la'akari da ƙirƙirar ɗaya kuma ba da gudummawa ga tarin bayanan ƙungiyar Nextclade.
Note that for reverse strands Nextclade: Lura cewa don ɓangaren juyawa Nextclade ya zaɓi don nuna mahallin amino acid
Note that motifs are detected after inse: Lura cewa an gano abubuwa bayan an cire abubuwan da aka shigar.

QC score: {{score}}. Reverted substituti: Sakamakon QC: {{score}}. Maye gurbin da aka mayar da su: {{numReversionSubstitutions}}, Maye gurbin da aka mayar da alama: {{numLabeledSubstitutions}}, Maye gurbin da ba a lakabi ba: {{numUnlabeledSubstitutions}}, Tsarin gogewa: {{totalDeletionRanges}}. Jimlar nauyi: {{weightedTotal}}
Recommended number of CPU threads**: Adadin da aka ba da shawarar zaren CPU**
Regions outside of alignment on both end: Yankunan da ke waje da daidaitawa a ƙarshen biyu: nucleotides da ke cikin jerin tunani, ba a cikin jerin tambaya ba kuma wanda ya zama “-” a cikin jerin daidaituwa.
Reload the page and start Nextclade fres: Sake ɗora shafin kuma fara Nextclade sabo
Reload the page to get the latest versio: Sake ɗora shafin don samun sabuwar sigar Nextclade.
Return to full Genome annotation and nuc: Koma zuwa cikakken bayanin Genome da kallon jerin nucleotide
Run Nextclade automatically after sequen: Gudun Nextclade ta atomatik bayan an samar da bayanan jerin
Server error. There was an error on the: Kuskuren uwar garke. Akwai kuskure akan uwar garken nesa. Da fatan za a tuntuɓi mai gudanarwar ku. (Lambar matsayin HTTP: {{status}})
Set threshold on maximum number of marke: Saita ƙofa akan matsakaicin adadin alamomi (canji, gogewa da dai sauransu) don nunawa a cikin ra'ayoyin nucleotide. Rage wannan lambar yana ƙara aiki. Idan an kai ƙofar, to, za a kashe ra'ayin jerin nucleotide.
Should be in range from {{minimum}} to {: Ya kamata ya kasance cikin kewayon daga {{minimum}} zuwa {{maximum}}
Show when a new version is available: Nuna lokacin da ake samun sabon sigar
Some of the adblocking browser extension: Wasu daga cikin ƙarin mai bincike na adlocking (AdBlock, uBlock, Privacy Badger da sauransu) da masu binciken sirri (kamar Brave) an san su don hana {{appName}} yin buƙatun cibiyar sadarwa zuwa wasu sabobin. {{appName}} yana girmama sirrinku, baya hidimar tallace-tallace ko tattara bayanan sirri. Duk lissafin ana yin shi a cikin burauzar ku. Kuna iya kashe adblocks cikin aminci akan {{domain}} da/ko ba da izinin {{domain}} don yin buƙatun cibiyar sadarwa zuwa uwar garken tushen bayananku.
Suggestion algorithm failed. Please repo: Shawarwarin algorithm ya gaza. Da fatan za a ba da rahoto ga masu haɓakawa
Suggestion algorithm was unable to find: Algorithm na shawara bai kasa samun bayanan da ya dace da jerin ku ba. Zaɓi saitin bayanai da hannu. Idan babu wani bayanan da ya dace, yi la'akari da ƙirƙirar da ba da gudummawa ɗaya ga tarin bayanan ƙungiyar Nextclade.

This dataset is provided by the communit: Wannan bayanan suna ba da su ne daga membobin al'umma. Masu haɓaka {{proj}} ba za su iya tabbatar da daidaiton bayanan al'umma ba ko samar da tallafi a gare su. Yi amfani da haɗarin kansa. Da fatan za a tuntuɓi marubutan bayanai don duk tambayoyi.
This dataset is provided by {{proj}} dev: Masu haɓaka {{proj}} an samar da wannan bayanan.
